root.name: Unwell Mel
root.description: OverviewUnwell Mel is a puzzle game developed and published by Big Fish Games for the PC and Mac platforms.PlotMel is sick and it is up to the player to try and cure all that ails him.GameplayGameplay takes place in zoomed in parts of Mel's body. The players job is to match sets of medicine and clear the board to "heal" the different ailments. Gameplay is very similar to Jewel Quest or Bejeweled where the player can swap two adjacent tiles to try and create matches of at least 3 or more of the same image.
